searches.title: Search Queries
searches.description: List of search queries to scrape from Google Maps. Each query can include a specific location for more targeted results.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search in (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'London, UK', 'Tokyo, Japan')

zoom.title: Zoom Level
zoom.description: Zoom level for the map (1-20). Higher values = more zoomed in. Optional.

maxPlaces.title: Maximum Places per Search
maxPlaces.description: Maximum number of places to scrape for each search query. Lower values = faster scraping, higher values = more comprehensive data.

includeReviews.title: Include Reviews
includeReviews.description: Extract reviews for each place. Reviews include author, rating, text, date, and owner responses. Note: This significantly increases scraping time.

maxReviews.title: Maximum Reviews per Place
maxReviews.description: Maximum number of reviews to extract for each place. Set to 0 to skip reviews entirely. Higher values increase scraping time.

downloadPhotos.title: Download Photos
downloadPhotos.description: Download and store place photos in the key-value store. Photos are saved with metadata including URLs and thumbnails. Warning: This consumes significant storage and increases scraping time.

extractContactInfo.title: Extract Contact Information
extractContactInfo.description: Extract email addresses and social media links from business websites. The scraper will visit each place's website to find contact information. Warning: This significantly increases scraping time.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for scraping. Proxies are essential for avoiding IP blocks and CAPTCHAs when scraping Google Maps at scale.

captchaConfiguration.title: CAPTCHA Configuration
captchaConfiguration.description: CAPTCHA solving settings. Google Maps may show CAPTCHAs during scraping. Provide an Anti-Captcha API key to automatically solve them.

antiCaptchaApiKey.title: Anti-Captcha API Key
antiCaptchaApiKey.description: Anti-Captcha API key for automatic CAPTCHA solving. Get your API key at https://anti-captcha.com. Leave empty to fail on CAPTCHA detection.

maxRetries.title: Max Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for CAPTCHA solving before giving up.

maxConcurrency.title: Maximum Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages to process simultaneously. Higher values = faster scraping but higher resource usage. Recommended: 3-5 for browser-based scraping.

navigationTimeoutSecs.title: Navigation Timeout (seconds)
navigationTimeoutSecs.description: Maximum time to wait for page navigation before timing out. Increase if you experience frequent timeout errors.

requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.title: Request Handler Timeout (seconds)
requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.description: Maximum time to process each page before timing out. Increase if extracting many reviews or photos.
